alert.note: Alert for Ness (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 12:05AM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Ness, Trego, northwestern Rush and southwestern Ellis Counties through 1245 AM CST... At 1204 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorms over northern Ness county, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ransom around 1220 AM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Trego Center and Cedar Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
